abstract.p: Casa Del Mar hotel in Santa Monica, Calif, marks first anniversary (S)

block.p: Through Nov. 15, the 129-room Casa Del Mar in Santa Monica is celebrating its first birthday by offering an hour of inline skating lessons or an hour with a personal trainer, a night in an oceanview room and breakfast. The package, called Endless Summer, is $399 single or double, plus tax and tips; (310) 581-5533.

Tread Lightly Travel, in Washington Depot, Conn., is organizing a ''Survivor'' trip to the Falkland Islands. It starts on a small island, with fully provisioned cabins. Each day, a plane removes one ostracized player. One by one, they reunite on another island. Price: about $1,500 a week for land costs and internal flights; (800) 643-0060.
